distribution.scatter_chance: v.distance = 324 ;v.x2 = math.floor((variable.originx)/v.distance)*v.distance;v.z2 = math.floor((variable.originz)/v.distance)*v.distance;v.c1 = math.round(10000*math.abs(query.noise((v.x2+64) / 200.0, (v.x2+64) / 200.0)));v.c2 = math.round(10000*math.abs(query.noise((v.x2+128)  / 200.0, (v.z2+128) / 200.0)));v.r1 = math.mod((v.c1 * 9301 + 49297),233280) / 233280.0;v.r2 = math.mod((v.c2 * 9301 + 49297),233280) / 233280.0;v.x1 = v.x2 + math.round(v.r1*(v.distance/16/2))*16 + v.distance/4;v.z1 = v.z2 + math.round(v.r2*(v.distance/16/2))*16 + v.distance/4;v.len1 = math.abs(variable.originx-v.x1);v.len2 = math.abs(variable.originz-v.z1);return v.len1<8&&v.len2<8 ? 100 : 0;
